name: df-caragen
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(ccaragen, cmpt(s0, come, crab(s1, cpw(cuni(cdm(cv(s0)))), wral(s2, cpw(cuni(cdm(cv(s0)))), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s0), cin(cv(s2), cv(s1))), cxad, cfv(cv(s0), cdif(cv(s2), cv(s1)))), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)))))))
comment: Define the sigma-algebra generated by an outer measure. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
